metadata.description: Caption title. In this edition, "sur l'assassinat de Collot-d'Herbois" is set in Roman type; it is set in italic type in some other editions

metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Skewed text. Damaged, loose pages.
